entry.title: $2600 // Beautiful 2 Bedroom in Prime PLG! Steps to Prospect Park & the Q Train
entry.content:
Newly Renovated 2 Bedroom W/Laundry in Building, in Prime PLG. Short walk to Prospect Park and the Q Train!
To schedule a showing Call/Text Email today! 718-915-0114 ~ Gershon@ZjamaRealty.com
Apartment Features:
- 2 Bedrooms
- Large Living Room
- New Kitchen w/Stainless Steel Appliances + Dishwasher
- Brand New full tiled Bathroom
- Hardwood Floors
- Great Sunlight
- Live-in Super
- Heat/Hot Water included
- Pet Friendly
For more information or to schedule a showing Call/Text/Email today! 718-915-0114 ~ Gershon@ZjamaRealty.com

entry.title: $1750 // TRUE 1 BED!King Size bedrm!Near PROSPECT PARK&Subway!MUST SEE!
entry.content:
About 135 Clarkson Ave Brooklyn, NY 11226

Unit Amenities: Hardwood Floors, Heat + Hot Water Included Public Unit Description: Lovely king size 1 bedrm apartment with separate living room,
large bedroom with closet, gorgeous parquet floors throughout and a tastefully tiled bathroom.

Located close to Prospect Park & the subway- Q train at Parkside or the 2/5 trains at Winthrop for a choice of commute into Manhattan.

Heat/hot water is included and your pets are welcome with a pet deposit!!

Description & Amenities Listing Description:

Multi-family - Three-story - Walk-up - Spacious - Granite counters - Modern kitchen - New appliances - Stainless steel appliances - Modern bathroom - Hardwood floors - Modern tile floor - Intercom - Lots of lighting - Recently renovated - Cable-ready - Laundromat nearby - Close to bars/nightlife - Near public transit - Near subway - Park nearby - Playground nearby - Restaurants nearby - School nearby - Shopping nearby

To schedule viewing contact show contact info
